firstProject.title: Academic Connection
firstProject.description: Academic Connection is a web application designed to connect students and parents with secondary schools

secondProject.title: TaskFlow
secondProject.description: Task management platform designed to simplify daily life. With an intuitive and efficient interface, you can create, read, update and delete tasks with ease.

thirdProject.title: EzRental
thirdProject.description: A property rental platform inspired by Airbnb, allowing users to search, book, and manage stays intuitively. It features search filters, user profiles, and a booking system for a seamless experience.

fourthProject.title: BettyStore
fourthProject.description: A Point of Sale (POS) system developed for a local store, enabling efficient sales management, inventory tracking, and customer management.
